# omitPunctuation

**Type Property**

Omit tokens of type [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLinguisticTag/punctuation] (all punctuation).

## Declaration

```swift
static var omitPunctuation: NSLinguisticTagger.Options { get }
```

## Constants

- **omitWords**: Omit tokens of type [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLinguisticTag/word] (items considered to be words).
- **omitWhitespace**: Omit tokens of type [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLinguisticTag/whitespace] (whitespace of all sorts).
- **omitOther**: Omit tokens of type [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLinguisticTag/other] (non-linguistic items, such as symbols).
- **joinNames**: Typically, multiple-word names will be returned as multiple tokens, following the standard tokenization practice of the tagger.  If this option is set, then multiple-word names will be joined together and returned as a single token.
